00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <deque>
00012 #include "hope/concurrency/spin_lock.h"
00013 #include <mutex>
00014 
00015 namespace hope::concurrency {
00016 
00017     template <typename T>
00018     class queue {
00019     public:
00020         queue() = default;
00021         queue(queue&&) = default;
00022         queue& operator=(queue&&) = default;
00023         queue(const queue&) = default;
00024         queue& operator=(const queue&) = default;
00025         ~queue() = default;
00026 
00027         template <typename... Args>
00028         void push(Args&&... args) {
00029             const std::lock_guard lock(m_lock);
00030             m_queue_impl.emplace_back(std::forward<Args...>(args...));
00031         }
00032 
00033         T pop() {
00034             const std::lock_guard lock(m_lock);
00035             auto top = m_queue_impl.front();
00036             m_queue_impl.pop_front();
00037             return top;
00038         }
00039 
00040         bool empty() const noexcept {
00041             const std::lock_guard lock(m_lock);
00042             return m_queue_impl.empty();
00043         }
00044 
00045     private:
00046         mutable spin_lock m_lock;
00047         std::deque<T> m_queue_impl;
00048     };
00049 
00050 }
